attributes.action: automatically ban drivers and confiscate their vehicles for those caught driving without valid motor insurance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The number of people who think that they can drive without insurance is enormous. Every legal driver is paying over the odds for their own insurance because of the criminals. Punishments are, at present,laughable. Something stronger is needed as a deterrant. Also, who pays if these people are involved in an accident while driving uninsured?
